definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle

sentences.english: I do believe she had eye shadow on.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑她准是描了黑眼圈。

sentences.english: Periorbital dark circles are often caused by sleep deprivation.
sentences.chinese: 黑眼圈通常是由睡眠不足引起的。

sentences.english: Traditional medicine think black rim of the eye is caused by kidney failure.
sentences.chinese: 传统医学认为黑眼圈是肾亏所致。

sentences.english: You can use a concealer to cover the dark circles around your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用一些遮瑕膏盖住你眼睛周围的黑眼圈。

sentences.english: I have a black eye because I get into a fight.
sentences.chinese: 我面上的黑眼圈，是因为我刚才打过架。

sentences.english: White-election at Tu foundation black eye, point-coating a thin coating.
sentences.chinese: 选亮白色粉底涂在黑眼圈的地方，点涂法薄薄涂一层。

sentences.english: She wore heavy makeup to mask the dark circles under her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她化浓妆以掩饰她的黑眼圈。

sentences.english: Minimizes dark circles, reduces fine lines and puffiness .
sentences.chinese: 减少黑眼圈，幼纹和眼袋。

sentences.english: Go into the same bags under the eyes can also dilute the black eye.
sentences.chinese: 去眼袋的同进还能淡化黑眼圈。

sentences.english: Lines, puffiness, dark eye circles can be used in four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 纹，浮肿，黑眼圈的人群四季均可使用。

sentences.english: The skin, diminish dark circles and puffiness.
sentences.chinese: 肌肤，减轻黑眼圈和浮肿。

sentences.english: If you're wondering where I got this shiner , I ran into a door.
sentences.chinese: 如果你奇怪我黑眼圈哪来的，我撞到门了。

sentences.english: A shiner is what you get when you get punched in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 所谓黑眼圈，就是眼睛被击打时产生的结果。

sentences.english: Mayo wound up with a black eye, and the reception abruptly came to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 结果梅奥得到一个黑眼圈，酒会突然停下来。

sentences.english: Besides, it can also whiten the skin around eyes, smooth away dark eye circles.
sentences.chinese: 同时润白眼部皮肤，淡化黑眼圈。

sentences.english: If you're wonderingswheresI got this shiner , I ransintosa door.
sentences.chinese: 如果你奇怪我黑眼圈哪来的，我撞到门了。

definition: puffiness under the eyes/bags under the eyes
to have dark circles under one's eyes/to have eyes like a panda
plump lower eyelids (considered to be an attractive feature)
